title: Ukrainian athlete’s ban from Olympic skeleton event over helmet images is upheld
summary_full: Vladyslav Heraskevych was removed from the men’s skeleton event for refusing to remove a helmet with portraits of Ukrainian athletes who’ve died in the war with Russia.
summary_public: Vladyslav Heraskevych was removed from the men’s skeleton event for refusing to remove a helmet with portraits of Ukrainian athletes who’ve died in the war with Russia.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: Ukrainian athletes who’ve died in the war with Russia

UA.label: positive
UA.evidence: Ukrainian athletes who’ve died in the war with Russia
